content: chore: adaptations for nightly-2024-12-20 #20148 Please review this PR. At the end of the month this diff will land in .

LGTM, but I wouldn't mind a second set of eyes.

I upstreamed List.Lex from Mathlib (and Lean also acquired List.lex, that takes boolean valued comparators and returns a Bool, and theory relating these), and we changed how Std.Range works, necessitating a few changes.
